discussion.allowUploadedImagesInPosts: Students can upload and use images in their posts
discussion.areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThis: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
discussion.areYouSureYouWantToShowThisPo: Are you sure you want to show this post?
discussion.classmateCreatedANewPost: A classmate created a new post!
discussion.discussAcrossAllPeriods: Students can discuss with students from all periods, not just their own
discussion.gateClassmateResponses: Students must create a post before viewing classmates' posts
discussion.notifyClassOnNewPosts: Notify all students in the class for all new posts (not replies)
discussion.repliedToADiscussionYouWereIn: {{usernames}} replied to a discussion you were in!
